name: Norton Antivirus Preferences File
summary: Learn about .VCPREF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The file Options.VcPref is a hidden file that is found under the Application Data\​Symantec\​Shared user directory. It also has a corresponding Norton AntiVirus .USERPROFILE file called MyProfile.UserProfile.
NOTE: Norton AntiVirus became Norton Security in 2014.

description: File used by Norton AntiVirus, an antivirus program for personal computers; contains preferences for Norton AntiVirus; may reside on a computer even after Norton AntiVirus has been deleted.
